page.title: 08A Day in the Life Of? 1
page.content: 8.00a.m. I got out of bed, got washed and dressed.I then had my breakfast,which was a black-cherry yoghurt and a piece of toast with marmalade on top.After that I packed my school bag and made a drink to go into my flask. 8.30a.m. I set off to go to school. On the way I called for my friend Hayley.When we arrived I played{laggie with Kate my best friend.{(Laggie, is {a game played with elastic.A person {stands at each end of the elastic and {a third person jumps in and out.)} 9.00a.m. The whistle went at 9.10 we stood still until the second whistle went then we walked around the back of the school.In the classroom we did topic, my topic is Moths and Butterflies.
